text:
Tomcat 4.1.21 crash,
I just want underline that the 2 DLL : pcre.dll and highlight.dll are built 
with ms c++ 6 and they are called from my java code using JNI. They work 
PERFECTLY with JDK 1.4.1 and tomcat 4.1.18.
this is the log file created by the VM:
